website_summaries.verdict: The best choice to buy to get decent low end sound quality from a budget 10-inch subwoofer.
pros: Uses minimal amplifier power, meaning you can use a lower power-rated amplifier to save money
Compatible with many external enclosures and audio boxes to eliminate the need to cut holes into a boat's interior
Wrap-around rubber gasket seals the subwoofer for airtight performance
cons: Older design lacks many of the high tech features of modern subwoofers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The wires got hot and burned into.... I fixed them ...ordered a Polk audio replacement speaker... so far it's still I. The box because it's working fine right now... I gave it 3 stars because it quit playing twice and had to fix it . Other than that .... BOOM!! It vibrates so hard I caught my girlfriend sitting on it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cone is all black - NOT as the photo shows
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with this sub but the photo shows a white cone. It does say "black" in the description, but the photo shows a lighter colored cone with a black surround. Most people probably don't care about this but I needed a light color for a demonstration.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Isotope

customer_reviews.title: Best subs for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome woofer great range I put 2 of them in a 3.2cf box with a 4x12x24vent on a alpine 500rms amp and holy s*** these things made your ears hurt and would play down to 26htz no problem compairable to my old type r 12
customer_reviews.author: Tandrews93

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive for the price. Nice build quality. I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for my need
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something not too crazy because I just needed a little more bass so I went with this one. It's perfect for my need. I match it with a old MTX amp I had and a seal box. It's sound great without waking up the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sub for the price. Truly not an infinite baffle sub, but performs great in our boat.
customer_reviews.author: geohil

customer_reviews.title: Great, crisp sounding bass
customer_reviews.text: Hooked th I s up in my boat and it made all the difference in the stereo feel. I hid mine behind a cooler storage area. Bass is omni directional, so it doesn't matter where you put it. I do have this hooked up to an amp and would certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bill goerger

customer_reviews.title: ... to rebild some old tower speakers very impressed sound great and great
customer_reviews.text: bought 4 of these to rebild some old tower speakers very impressed sound great and great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... ported box in my boat just what I needed good clean bass not overpowering but plenty of
customer_reviews.text: placed in ported box in my boat just what I needed good clean bass not overpowering but plenty of bass
customer_reviews.author: NICK NEUHALFEN

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this subwoofer. I built an enclosure out of marine grade plywood based on Polks specs, added 5 coats of spar urethane and placed on our deck. Adds so much depth to our outdoor speakers.
customer_reviews.author: JacketbyBerth

customer_reviews.title: I like them.
customer_reviews.text: I use Polk speakers in all my rides. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: DeKovin H.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound at an affordable price! Polk audio always deliver. Have these running off a ZAPCO 350 watt amp. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jsmpromotions

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker and best prices. Great company to order from
customer_reviews.author: dw mi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome subs for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these subs. Second pair and been happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: Dmac of Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Good bass
customer_reviews.text: Good bass pounding subs. Match with a good amp and they sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Just get a strong amp to really make it kick
customer_reviews.text: Could be better but for the price its good with my 5000 watt pyramid amp bridged!
customer_reviews.author: jjj

customer_reviews.title: Polk is a quality brand!
customer_reviews.text: Boss KIT-2 Complete 8 Gauge Amplifier Installation Kit Sold by Amazon.com LLC $10.83 Boss Audio R1100M Mosfet Monoblock Power Amplifier with Remote Subwoofer Level Control Sold by Amazon.com LLC $49.99 I installed this sinlge sub in a 2007 Honda Civic with the above and WOW! Amazing bass that I can listen while I drive along with my other Polk speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Typical A+ Polk performance
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say? Polk seems to have great sound for the dollar spent and this woofer is no exception. I love it so much that I purchased another.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda Talkmitt

customer_reviews.title: great sub
customer_reviews.text: i put it with a kicker 500 amp and it sounds awsome. it has lots of base and was easy to install
customer_reviews.author: nick morris

customer_reviews.title: Polk Sub is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: i have always owned polk car speakers but never had a sub from them before. i love the car speakers that i owned so for $50 how could i not give this sub a try? Just fantastic sound and extremely loud. I am only running 1 of the 10in subs bridged mono at 4 ohms. My amp puts out 250 RMS bridged to this speaker which holds at 270 RMS - remember kids, more isnt always better. you buy the right equipment and you can hammer out some bass with 1 sub
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z.

customer_reviews.title: Easy install into Cherokee Subthump 10" box. Great sound at a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to install into a 1993 Cherokee Subthump box, something that wasn't overly punchy, but would add the low-end sound that my four 5.25" speakers sorely lacked. This was an easy install into the box, and is a perfect complement to the rest of the stereo. I've cranked the amp to see how it performs at higher power - it'll definitely hit hard if I want it to! But for the moment, I've dialed it back to a more modest volume that my wife and kids enjoy more. ;)
customer_reviews.author: J. Golightly

customer_reviews.title: Good sound Poor durability
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was a good sounding speaker but just didn't hold up. I bought 2 used them for over a year. Good quality sound using my amp and setting them as rear speakers and not subs. Good sound deep base. 1 failed rather quickly. So for the quality I would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: LHT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sub
customer_reviews.text: Never disappointed with Polk Audio quality. Purchased (6) Polks 620RT for home. Now purchased db1040 for my sub. My wife says the house sounds like a club. Would purchase again and highly recommend the db1040 sub and ALL Polk Audio products. Excellent quality. Picture online does not do it justice. Comes with allen head screws (used a 1/4 ratchet with allen head to screw it in). But very easy to do so if you just take your time. Using a Denon receiver to push sub. Overall, you will not be disappointed at all with this sub!!!
customer_reviews.author: miz_avital

customer_reviews.title: Nice sub
customer_reviews.text: Nice sub, good quality feel and appearance. I used it replace a old blown sub in a Polk Audio 10" home theater box with built in amp. Dimensions were just slightly different to the original but was easy to fit in and looks original. Sounds good too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Polk Audio DB1040SV Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: This sub is great! I installed this in a old Bazooka tube that had seen its last speaker fail. This sub hits hard and works very hard for you. I have a wakeboarding boat, and we installed this tube/speaker combo under a rear bench in the rear storage hatch. It sounds great, and carries, I have been out on the water waiting for the boat to turn back around and pick me up for my next pull; and you can hear the sound system clearly, and the bass that is put off is impressive. Great speaker, and takes a lot of power well, and will work hard when requested.
customer_reviews.author: SonOfOdin

customer_reviews.title: Put 2 of these in a sealed enclosure about 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: Put 2 of these in a sealed enclosure about 1 cu. ft. per sub. 500w @ 2ohms. Precise and loud bass from 2 of these.
customer_reviews.author: Randol I Stancil

customer_reviews.title: I swear by Polk Audio!
customer_reviews.text: Polk Audio blows any other speaker out of the water for its price and Sound! I have 10's in my Mustang, 325i and my truck. They never let me down!
customer_reviews.author: Bolted4Life

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and accurate within tuned enclosure
customer_reviews.text: If you want the extended bass response, do not install this into a sealed small enclosure (as in car box). It does best with a properly designed ported enclosure. It is very smooth, with a bass that is true, rather than an exaggerated boom. Thus, this subwoofer is excellent for true music reproduction. Those requiring an abnormal synthetic boom that is +12 db, and so on, should shy away from this subwoofer. Everyone else will be extremely happy !
customer_reviews.author: Electric Eccentric

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these to use in my home theater.. Two boxes of two.. 3.2cuf tuned to 35hz.. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reitmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Blown away!
customer_reviews.text: After these I would never buy another brand woofer, hands down amazing sound...deep bass, yet super tight accurate performance
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: superb sub. used a sealed box and couldnt be much more happier. bass is silky smooth and punchy. i liked it better than a 12 inch sub. 12 inch had deep sound but was lill less punchier. for dance and rock, 10 seems best choice. will buy it again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Viksmicro

customer_reviews.title: Great Subwoofer that outclasses subwoofers much more expensive than it.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great quality audio Great response Includes mounting screws They include an upgrade to a 2 year warranty Cons: No screw terminals While cheaper subwoofers can get the job done, this subwoofer has superb response that blows cheaper and more expensive subwoofers out of the water. I am running a 500 watt SSL amplifier, and mounted it in the spare tire. It has great fidelity, and if I want to it can raise the volume to be more obnoxious than everybody around me. But thats not the reason you buy this one, you get this subwoofer because you value bass you can still tell is a song when you turn up the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Sven

customer_reviews.title: Great Sub!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to have one these in my setup and I am extremely happy with the product. It delivers the perfect sound!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Yglesias

customer_reviews.title: Good little thumper. Good in small spaces. Easy to hide for me.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid bass. Nice sound with out being over powering. For the price, at the time of purchase was great. I'm not sure if I could get much better. Well at least for me to warrant a different purchase. This was installed in a 2003 3500 Dodge Ram Crew Cab. Under the driver side rear seat. Works great, and easy to get to. It works well in the confined space it was given. Also has resisted a lot of sand and dust. Just don't expect to much from a speaker like this. If you want a hammer, then look else where. If you need some bass, and not a cannon. Then look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Metty

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: For the few months I've had this installed in my 20' Sea Ray, it has not disappointed. I installed it in a sealed box (Atrend E10S) and drive it with two channels of a JBL marine amp (MA 6004) bridged. A little more power wouldn't hurt, but overall I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: troz61

customer_reviews.title: (sorry for the bad pun!
customer_reviews.text: Alot of bang for the buck with this sub!!! (sorry for the bad pun!!) Very pleased with how this sub sounds paired with my Rockford Fosgate amp!
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This subwoofer sounds great in my Jeep Wrangler. I chose this speaker because it is marine rated (water resistant). Not only does it look good, but it sounds great! The bass hits are nice and tight, and very clean sounding. I could not be more pleased with my purchase. Also, I paired it with a polk audio amplifier again for the marine rating. I will not hesitate when I am ready or need to purchase another set.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

product_meta.title: Polk Audio db1040 10-Inch Single Voice Coil Subwoofer (Single, Black)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe Polk Audio db1040 10 inch voice coil subwoofer speaker is incredible sound at an affordable price. The polypropylene cone with rigid ABS dustcap stiffens the cone for greater mechanical stability and lower distortion. Marine Certified Polk db series speakers are built tough to withstand the toughest environments so they are perfect for use in boats of all types. That's why Correct Craft offers Polk Audio speakers in their award winning Nautiques ski and wakeboarding boats. The db series subwoofers from Polk Audio are all about belting out deep, precise, stomach shaking bass. The db Series Subs produce gutsy bass in sealed, ported and band pass enclosures. No matter how you like your bass, you get the tight, musical loud bass that db is known for.
feature_bullets: A marine single voice coil subwoofer speaker
Equipped with 10 inch black Dynamic Balance polymer composite cone
Power handling: 270 watts continuous, 540 watts peak
Marine certified Polk db Series speakers are built tough to withstand the toughest environments

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars65 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
